about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a web developer with experience in designing interactive UIs and creating Full Stack solutions. I enjoy learning new technologies and improving my skills to build efficient, scalable applications.

skills.label: Frontend Development
skills.value: Design and development of interactive, responsive UIs with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, ensuring a smooth and engaging experience.

skills.label: UX/UI Optimization
skills.value: Creating effective landing pages optimized for conversion, applying modern design and user experience principles.

skills.label: Databases
skills.value: Managing relational (MySQL) and non-relational databases, focusing on efficient design and optimized queries.

skills.label: Tech Integration
skills.value: Implementing Full Stack projects with modern frameworks like MERN and tools such as Docker, Socket.io, and Postman.
